mapper.select: /*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.display.repository.master.DpDisplayPageCornerDao.selectDpPageCornerList [전시카테고리 코너 리스트 조회] [박민우] */ SELECT A.disp_tmpl_no, A.disp_tmpl_corner_seq, A.corner_name, A.corner_name_disp_type, A.set_count, A.note_text, A.sort_seq, A.use_yn, A.rgster_no, A.rgst_dtm, A.moder_no, A.mod_dtm, B.LOGIN_ID AS RGSTER_ID, B.ADMIN_NAME AS RGSTER_NAME, C.LOGIN_ID AS MODER_ID, C.ADMIN_NAME AS MODER_NAME, D.DISP_YN, ( select STUFF(( select DISTINCT ',' + DBO.FN_CODE_VALUE('CONT_TYPE_CODE', AA.CONT_TYPE_CODE) from dp_display_template_corner_set AA WHERE AA.DISP_CONT_COUNT > 0 and AA.DISP_TMPL_NO = a.DISP_TMPL_NO and AA.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ = a.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ for xml path('') ), 1, 1, '') ) as corner_set_name FROM dp_display_template_corner A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_ADMIN B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.RGSTER_NO = B.ADMIN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_ADMIN C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MODER_NO = C.ADMIN_NO INNER JOIN DP_DISPLAY_PAGE_CORNER D WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ = A.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ WHERE A.disp_tmpl_no = #{bean.dispTmplNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DISP_PAGE_NO = #{bean.dispPageNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.sort_seq ASC

/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.display.repository.master.DpDisplayPageCornerDao.selectDpCategoryCornerListCount [전시카테고리 코너 리스트 카운트 조회] [박민우] */ SELECT FROM dp_display_template_corner A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_ADMIN B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.RGSTER_NO = B.ADMIN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_ADMIN C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MODER_NO = C.ADMIN_NO INNER JOIN DP_DISPLAY_PAGE_CORNER D WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ = A.DISP_TMPL_CORNER_SEQ WHERE A.disp_tmpl_no = #{bean.dispTmplNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DISP_PAGE_NO = #{bean.dispPageNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
